biotools.summary: Frites is a Python toolbox for assessing information-theorical measures on human and animal neurophysiological data (M/EEG, Intracranial). The aim of Frites is to extract task-related cognitive brain networks (i.e modulated by the task). The toolbox also includes directed and undirected connectivity metrics such as group-level statistics.
